title: University of Kentucky Bookstore
name: University of Kentucky Bookstore
description: During the Fall 2012 semester, students from the University of Kentucky chapter of United Students Against Sweatshops have restarted the 10 year-waiting, Workers Rights Consortium campaign. After receiving misleading and misinforming communication from university administration, students were poised to act in protest. Rather than pursuing more traditional forms of protest, students held a "photobooth" in front of the bookstore's Nike display, demanding that a brand of living-wage, union made apparel, Alta Gracia, replace the Nike brand window display. The student took photo-petition submissions and posted them to both the bookstore Facebook page and University twitter feed - ensuring adminsitration were aware of students actively protesting and supporting various apparel suppliers on campus. The action was successful and the window display was replaced.
